# Plugin

XHR Cache provide a nuxtJS plugin to expose all resources.

Resources from SSR are injected with a server middleware to expose it to the plugin and avoid making an HTTP request to get the ressource.

Beside all resources from client side are using fetch method to get the resource.

# methods

# getResourceById(resourceId)

  • Returns: Promise<Resource>

Return a specific resoure identified by his id

const resource = await this.$xhrCache.getResourceById('my-resource')

# getResourceByUrl(resourceUrl)

  • Returns: Promise<Resource>

Return a specific resource identified by his url.

This is commonly used when using custom middlewrare

const resource = await this.$xhrCache.getResourceByUrl('categories/1425')

# refreshResourceById(resourceId, apiKey)

  • Returns: Exception if error

Refresh a specific resource identifed by his id.

The apiKey argument is provided by the apikey option and is used to avoid everyone refreshing the resource.

this.$xhrCache.refreshResourceById('my-resource', 'MGM90YE-2HEMCCJ-QQ0RGJT-QG3S4BX')
